\[%mdk-data-line={28}
\left(\frac {3^{k+1} - 3} {2} \right) + 3^{k+1} = \left(\frac {3^{k+2}-3} {2} \right)
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={30}

\left(\frac {3^{k+1} - 3} {2} \right) +  \left(\frac{2(3^{k+1})} {2} \right) = \left(\frac {3^{k+2}-3} {2} \right) 
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
